trans-unit.source: Provides a standard set of navigation-related commands.
trans-unit.target: 提供一组标准的与导航相关的命令。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands> class exposes a standard set of navigation-related commands, including browser and document navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands>类公开一组标准的导航相关的命令，包括浏览器和文档导航。

trans-unit.source: For more information on commands and commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关命令和命令的详细信息，请参阅[命令概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="Browse Back" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="Browse Back" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to navigate back to the previous page in the journal.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示打算向后定位到前一页在日志中。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> implement support for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseBack%2A>, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> 和<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>实现对响应支持<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseBack%2A>，但不需要使用它; 在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseBack%2A> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseBack%2A>结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> provides an implementation that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseBack%2A> command by navigating the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> back, if there are journal entries on the back stack.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>提供响应的实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseBack%2A>命令通过导航<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>回退，如果后的堆栈上有日志条目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="Browse Forward" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="Browse Forward" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to navigate forward the next page in the journal.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示要向前定位日志中的下一页的意图。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> implement support for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseForward%2A> command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> 和<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>实现对响应支持<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseForward%2A>命令时，尽管你不需要使用它; 在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseForward%2A> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseForward%2A>结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> provides an implementation that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseForward%2A> command by navigating the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> forward, if there are journal entries on the forward stack.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>提供响应的实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseForward%2A>命令通过导航<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>转发，如果前进堆栈上有日志条目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="Browse Home" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="Browse Home" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to navigate home.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示打算主页导航。

trans-unit.source: There is no implementation for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseHome%2A> command on any given [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] class.
trans-unit.target: 没有用于响应实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseHome%2A>命令针对任何给定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]类。

trans-unit.source: As such, you need to provide an appropriate implementation, which is shown in the example.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你需要提供正确地实现，该示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to implement code that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseHome%2A> command in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何实现响应的代码<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseHome%2A>命令结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="Browse Stop" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="Browse Stop" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to stop the browser loading.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示打算停止加载浏览器。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> implement support for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseStop%2A> command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> 和<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>实现对响应支持<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseStop%2A>命令时，尽管你不需要使用它; 在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseStop%2A> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseStop%2A>结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> provides an implementation that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseStop%2A> command by stopping the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>提供响应的实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.BrowseStop%2A>命令通过停止当前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>导航。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="Decrease Zoom" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="Decrease Zoom" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to decrease the zoom.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示降低缩放的意图。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> implement support for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer><xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>实现对响应支持<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A>命令时，尽管你不需要使用它; 在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现负责应用程序编写器。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A>结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> provides an implementation that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> command by decreasing the zoom percentage.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>提供响应的实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A>命令通过减少的缩放百分比。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="Favorites" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="Favorites" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to manage and navigate to favorites.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示打算管理并导航到收藏夹。

trans-unit.source: There is no implementation for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Favorites%2A> command on any given [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] class.
trans-unit.target: 没有用于响应实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Favorites%2A>命令针对任何给定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]类。

trans-unit.source: As such, you need to provide an appropriate implementation, which is shown in the example.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你需要提供正确地实现，该示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to implement code that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Favorites%2A> command in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何实现响应的代码<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Favorites%2A>命令结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="First Page" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="First Page" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to go to the first page.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示想要转到第一页。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> implement support for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage%2A> command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer><xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>实现对响应支持<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage%2A>命令时，尽管你不需要使用它; 在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现负责应用程序编写器。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage%2A> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage%2A>结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> provides an implementation that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage%2A> command by going to the first page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>提供响应的实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage%2A>命令通过转到第一页。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="Go To Page" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="Go To Page" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to change the zoom.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示要更改缩放的意图。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> implement support for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage%2A> command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>实现对响应支持<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage%2A>命令时，尽管你不需要使用它; 在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage%2A> command in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage%2A>命令结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> provides an implementation that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage%2A> command by going to the page specified by the text value of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>提供响应的实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage%2A>命令通过转到指定的文本值的页<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="Increase Zoom" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="Increase Zoom" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to increase the zoom.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示提高缩放的意图。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> implement support for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer><xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>实现对响应支持<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A>命令时，尽管你不需要使用它; 在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现负责应用程序编写器。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A>结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> provides an implementation that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> command by decreasing the zoom percentage.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>提供响应的实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A>命令通过减少的缩放百分比。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="Last Page" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="Last Page" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to go to the last page.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示想要转到最后一页。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> implement support for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage%2A> command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer><xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>实现对响应支持<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage%2A>命令时，尽管你不需要使用它; 在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现负责应用程序编写器。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage%2A> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage%2A>结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> provides an implementation that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage%2A> command by going to the last page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>提供响应的实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage%2A>命令通过转至最后一页。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="Navigate Journal" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="Navigate Journal" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to navigate the journal.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示想要导航日志。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> implement support for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NavigateJournal%2A> command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> 和<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>实现对响应支持<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NavigateJournal%2A>命令时，尽管你不需要使用它; 在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NavigateJournal%2A> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NavigateJournal%2A>结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> provides an implementation that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NavigateJournal%2A> command by navigating to the specified journal entry on either the forward or back stacks of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>提供响应的实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NavigateJournal%2A>命令通过导航到上一页或下一页堆栈上的指定的日志条目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>。

trans-unit.source: The journal entries are provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter> to the top-level `Navigate Journal` <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 日志条目提供的<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter>到顶级`Navigate Journal` <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Each journal entry is bound to a child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NavigateJournal%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: 每个日志条目都绑定到子<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NavigateJournal%2A>命令。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="Next Page" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="Next Page" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to go to the next page.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示想要转到下一页。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> implement support for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage%2A> command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer><xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>实现对响应支持<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage%2A>命令时，尽管你不需要使用它; 在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现负责应用程序编写器。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage%2A> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage%2A>结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> provides an implementation that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage%2A> command by going to the next page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>提供响应的实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage%2A>命令通过转到下一页。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="Previous Page" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="Previous Page" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to go to the previous page.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示想要转到前一页。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> implement support for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage%2A> command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer><xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>实现对响应支持<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage%2A>命令时，尽管你不需要使用它; 在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现负责应用程序编写器。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage%2A> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage%2A>结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> provides an implementation that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage%2A> command by going to the previous page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>提供响应的实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage%2A>命令通过转到前一页。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="Refresh" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="Refresh" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to refresh the current page.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示若要刷新当前页面的意图。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> implement support for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Refresh%2A> command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> 和<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>实现对响应支持<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Refresh%2A>命令时，尽管你不需要使用它; 在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Refresh%2A> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Refresh%2A>结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> provides an implementation that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Refresh%2A> command by reloading the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>提供响应的实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Refresh%2A>命令通过重新加载当前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="Search" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="Search" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to search.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示要搜索的意图。

trans-unit.source: There is no implementation for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Search%2A> command on any given [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] class.
trans-unit.target: 没有用于响应实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Search%2A>命令针对任何给定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]类。

trans-unit.source: As such, you need to provide an appropriate implementation, which is shown in the example.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你需要提供正确地实现，该示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to implement code that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Search%2A> command in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何实现响应的代码<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Search%2A>命令结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the <see langword="Zoom" /> command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see langword="Zoom" /> 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to set the zoom level.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示想要设置的缩放级别。

trans-unit.source: There is no implementation for responding to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Zoom%2A> command on any given [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] class.
trans-unit.target: 没有用于响应实现<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Zoom%2A>命令针对任何给定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]类。

trans-unit.source: As such, you need to provide an appropriate implementation, which is shown in the example.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你需要提供正确地实现，该示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to implement code that responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Zoom%2A> command in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何实现响应的代码<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.Zoom%2A>命令结合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>。
